title: Left and Right Unite! Beach Faux Pas? 07.13.22
itunes:title: Left and Right Unite! Beach Faux Pas? 07.13.22
description:
In episode 1286, Jack and Miles are joined by writer, comedian, founder of Follow Through and co-host of Running The Break, C.J. Toledano, to discuss… Democrats and Republicans are united! Gas is now too cheap for Fox News? Broad societal question: Is it disrespectful to blast music at the beach? And more!

  1. POLITICS Most Democrats want someone other than Biden to run for president in 2024 — but he could still beat Trump, poll says
  2. Half of G.O.P. Voters Ready to Leave Trump Behind, Poll Finds

  3. Gas is now too cheap for Fox News?

  4. Broad societal question: Is it disrespectful to blast music at the beach?

LISTEN: We-Love Radio by Stennes

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
